content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for your interest in the apartment, Ryanah. I'm happy to discuss the rental price with you. Could you please provide me with your budget for the monthly rental?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: My budget is 500 Euro. I am a student and I want to be on good terms with my landlord. I am dependable and responsible. The apartment is 25 square meters.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Thank you for sharing your budget, Ryanah. I appreciate your willingness to be a good tenant. Based on the size of the apartment and your budget, I would suggest a rental price of 450 Euro per month. This price reflects the current market rates for similar sized apartments in the area and also takes into account the cost of maintenance and other expenses that come with renting an apartment. I hope this price works for you. What do you think?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 450 Euro per month. Is there anything else I need to know before signing the lease agreement?

Thank you for your help.

Best regards,
Ryanah Rahman
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great to hear that you agree to the rental price, Ryanah. Before signing the lease agreement, please make sure to carefully read and understand all the terms and conditions of the agreement. It's important to know your rights and responsibilities as a tenant, as well as the landlord's rights and responsibilities. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to ask. I'm here to help. Once you have signed the lease agreement, you can move in and start enjoying your new home. Best of luck to you, Ryanah.
name: Heinrich Heine
